contextId.information: These words do not include the Colossians. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclusive]])
contextId.quote: We give ... our Lord ... we always

contextId.information: The words "our" and "us" do not include the Colossians. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclusive]])
contextId.quote: our beloved ... our behalf ... to us

contextId.information: These words do not include the Colossians. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclusive]])
contextId.quote: we heard ... we have not stopped ... We have been asking ... We have been praying

contextId.information: The word "we" refers to Paul and Timothy but not to the Colossians. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclusive]])
These words do not include the Colossians. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclusive]])
